summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThis COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream is a silky moisturizer that's like a sip of water for thirsty skin, providing lasting hydration and suppleness.
details: DetailsBenefitsQuickly absorbs, providing long-lasting hydrationReduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesPlumps and softens the skinDeeply replenishes dehydrated skinLightweight, non-irritating formulaFor all skin types, especially dry, dehydrated, or sensitive skinDermatologist testedHypoallergenicpH: 6-7Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Deeply moisturizes depleted skinFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesAlcoholItem 2542834How To UseApply a proper amount of cream onto the face and use your fingers to gently pat into the skin for better absorption.IngredientsHippophae Rhamnoides Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, 1,2-hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Panthenol, Dimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a proper amount of cream onto the face and use your fingers to gently pat into the skin for better absorption.

reviews.headline: Love this product so far!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks. Each day I look forward to putting it on. It has clean ingredients and is extremely moisturizing (I have fairly dry skin). I use it before a moisturizer & it's perfect! I would buy it again!

reviews.headline: Lovely, thick but not greasy moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my new go-to moisturizer for my extremely dry skin. It feels very nourishing, but not at all greasy, and is absorbed quickly by my skin. I don't believe there's any added fragrance--it just smells vaguely of ingredients.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I use this every night before bed. I have super sensitive and acne prone skin and this works so well for me. I have gone through 4 jars so far and will forever repurchase.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I loved it so much

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: Love this stuff

reviews.headline: I'm confused
reviews.comments: I seem to have an unpopular opinion about this one. I have pretty balanced skin and I take good care of it. I don't use a million products but the ones i do use are nice products. Im not sure what it is about this moisturizer but it does not soak into my skin. I don't use a ton underneath it either. But it sits on top and doesn't soak in, even with only using a teeny amount. The texture is nice out of the jar and its not overly scented which i like. I just wish it absorbed and I didn't feel like i have a film ln my face when i use it. I, unfortunately, will be returning.

reviews.headline: Rich and buttery!
reviews.comments: I literally dip ONE finger lightly and thats enough for my whole face! A little goes a very long way! Its super rich but once it warms up on your skin it becomes thin and light like a gel moisturizer. Id say good for all skin types. Its not scented and doesnt break me out!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love
reviews.comments: This moisturizer has long lasting moisturize. It most definitely does soothe, nourish, and plump skin ❤️ absolutely repurchases.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product at night
reviews.comments: I love it because its very hydrating.the rating on the Yuka app is a 10/10. i think its an amazing price with lots of product . it has made a difference in my skin However, i am not the fan of the packaging because it gets everywhere!

reviews.headline: Best Moisturizer Ever!!!
reviews.comments: this moisturizer is so good! best one I've tried so far. It is a little pricey but other than that it is soooo good.

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: Im 46 a former esthetician and aside from sun, I'm pretty crazy about my skincare. I do not like spending a ton on products. This stuff is phenomenal! My fine lines are lessened this is so hydrating and amazing!! This os definitely staying in my skincare routine

As a teenager with dehydrated skin, I'm a little picky with my moisturizers. Some are extremely expensive or they're too water, too thick, or just don't have the best texture. I accidentally discovered this moisturizer while looking for a new one to replace my cerave, and I ordered it. I immediately fell in love! It's long lasting, gives me dewy skin, VERY long hydration and wears amazing under makeup. A little goes a long way, and putting too much will probably make your makeup pill. I use this day and night or when I wash my face. I highly will recommend this for dry skin, I've gotten many of my friends to use this and they love it!

reviews.headline: WOW.
reviews.comments:
I have spent the last couple of years- yes, YEARS- trying to find the perfect moisturizer. I've tried them all: Eminence, Peach and Lily, Tatcha, Avené, Vanicream, The Ordinary, CeraVe, Neutrogena, Orgins, PTR, stuff from the spas I worked at (I'm a licensed Aesthetician) plus more and nothing has been my favorite. 

I wouldn't see great results or they'd break me out either in fungal acne or white heads, my skin would feel greasy or be flakey. I have sensitive, combo skin thats very acne prone and rosacea to top it all off. I finally broke down and asked an Ulta worker for their opinion and they brought me to this. I was hesitant but bought it anyways. 

My skin has seriously never looked better!! Fine lines? Gone. Redness? Where?? Breakouts?? Haven't heard of her. I cannot talk about this enough! If you're stuggling like I was, PLEASE buy this asap. I can't get over the fact it's $25- you get so much and just a little bit goes a long ways. I'm obsessed. I would never write such a long review but the people need to know!

reviews.headline: So hydrating!
reviews.comments: Super hydrating and leaves my skin dewy

reviews.headline: Acne prone
reviews.comments: I am a licensed Esthetician & have never had acne. I started using this product for a bout a month now and my face has broke out so much! Every day is a new break out on my cheeks. If you have ACNE prone skin DO NOT do this! As soon as I stopped using this my skin cleared up. :/

reviews.headline: Acne prone
reviews.comments: I am a licensed Esthetician & have never had acne. I started using this product for a bout a month now and my face has broke out so much! Every day is a new break out on my cheeks. If you have ACNE prone skin DO NOT do this! As soon as I stopped using this my skin cleared up. :/

reviews.headline: AS GOOD AS THEY SAY
reviews.comments: ITS JUST AMAING GET It nowww

reviews.headline: Yeah would buy this again
reviews.comments: I'm loving this moisturizer I'm loving how hydrated my face looks

reviews.headline: First timer and satisfied
reviews.comments: This product leaves my skin feeling silky and soft.  Its light weight keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day. I also like that it doesn't counteract to my make-up. Nonetheless, I will be a returning user.

reviews.headline: AMAZINGGG!! My Kiehls replacement
reviews.comments: I've been using this moisturizer for the past 8 mo. day & night. It's super hydrating and absorbs into the skin nicely. I have combination skin & live in Chicago- no issues so far in the winter / summer temps. I'm obsessed and a jar lasts forever.

media.headline: I absolutely love this product at night
media.caption: I love this product but not the packaging!

faceoff_positive.comments: This face cream is amazing, its the first heavily moisturizing cream I can use that doesn't clog my pores. I'm kind of obsessed. Its cooling on the skin and keeps it moisturized, my face always looks plump and smooth the next day. I've been struggling with clogged pores from my heavier winter skincare products but this doesn't irritate me. I've been trying out CosRX products and this is my favorite so far. I use it in combination with the Hydrium Watery Toner, together they're a great team for dry winter skin. I can tell Ill be using this cream all year long to keep my skin balanced. 10/10
faceoff_positive.headline: phenomenal face cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have acne-prone, dehydrated skin. I had very high hopes for this considering COSrx always uses "clean" and simple ingredients. However, just like CeraVe daily moisturizing lotion, this broke me out. I believe it's the fatty alcohols, which some people are sensitive to. However if you're not as acne-prone this might be a good option for you.
The texture is gel-cream like, but relatively thick and emollient. I personally found this to stay pretty sticky, and it always felt like my face was sticking to my pillow at night. 
I think if your skin is super super dry, this will be nice. However my skin is too easily-congested for a cream like this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Broke me out
